name: NSControl.StateValue
desc: A constant that indicates whether a control is on, off, or in a mixed state.

items.name: static let on: NSControl.StateValue
items.desc: A constant value that indicates a control is on or selected.

items.name: static let off: NSControl.StateValue
items.desc: A constant value that indicates a control is off or unselected.

items.name: static let mixed: NSControl.StateValue
items.desc: A constant value that indicates a control is in a mixed state, neither on nor off.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a state value from a raw value.
